summary: SKY Companions are 7 Standalone Followers, all are Marriageable and Essential, and will level with the Player. Body Options: CBBE, UNP, SeveNBase, UNPB, CBBE BBP, SeveNBase BBP, and UNPB BBP. Single esp. ECE presets available.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][center][/center][center][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2agq1s8.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ibhuth.jpg[/img][/center][center][/center][center][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Now with ECE Presets![/size]
[/color][/b][/center][size=6][b][color=#00ffff]Description [/color]
[/b][/size][size=1][color=#999999]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[/size]
[size=2]SKY Companions are 7 Standalone Followers, all are Marriageable and Essential, and will level with the Player, up to level 150. All in a single esp.
[/size][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/e8a4xd.jpg[/img]
[b]Body Options:[/b][size=2] CBBE, UNP, SeveNBase, UNPB, CBBE BBP, SeveNBase BBP, and UNPB BBP.[/size]

[color=#00ffff][size=6][b]Where Are They?[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#999999][size=1]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]
[/color]
I placed them in the [b]SilverBlood Inn in Markarth.[/b] I thought Markarth was a less common place for followers. If you are not happy with this location, there are College of WinterHold and Dragonsreach options available.

[b][color=#00ffff][size=6]Notes[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#999999][size=1]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size][/color]
I love seeing pictures of people using my followers, so user photos are greatly appreciated. As well as endorsements if you enjoy the mod. 

[color=#00ffff][size=6][b]Installation
[/b][/size][/color][size=1][color=#999999]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[/size]
Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. This mod has a single esp. This mod is not made for a torrented game, and If you have any problems using it with a torrented game, I will not provide support.

[color=#00ffff][size=6][b]Uninstallation[/b][/size][/color]
[size=2][color=#999999]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]

Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.
[/size]

[color=#00ffff][size=6][b]Credits
[/b][/size][/color][size=1][color=#999999]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[/size]
dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Unp Body
[/url]Caliente for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Cbbe Body
[/url]Crosscrusade, DeMoNhUnTeR1986 , Sevennity for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase Body
[/url]Blessed Redux Project team for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB Body
[/url]HelloSanta for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url] and [size=1]
[/size][size=2]conversions of the hair meshes and textures from the SG hair pack.
Newseas, Peggy and Cazy for the original hairs.
[/size][/font][font=Georgia]LogRaam for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
nevenbridge81 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
zzjay for the [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?][font=Georgia]Smile in HD
[/font][/url][font=Georgia]AlexSlesh for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926/?]CBBE BBP TBBP body[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]
[/url][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#00ffff][size=5][b]Mods Used In Screenshots[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber Enb 3[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/?]Killer Keos Skimpy Armor Replacer[/url][/font]
